model.name: Mahina Monogram Jogging Pants
model.disambiguatingDescription: An iconic Louis Vuitton cut revisited with a luminous seasonal signature. Crafted from crisp nylon, these essential sporty jogging pants feature an allover print of the Flight Mode capsule’s Mahina Monogram in an alluring palette. Contrasting brass hardware highlights two practical zipped pockets and a chic hook closure.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• Main Material : 100% Polyamide
  • Lining : 55% Polyester, 24% Viscose, 21% Cupro
  • Dark Navy Blue
  • Regular fit
  • Model wears size 36
  • Model measurements : Bust 32'' / 82 cm, Height 5' 9.5" / 176 cm, Waist 24'' / 61cm, Hips 34'' / 86cm
  • Made in Italy
  • Do not wash
  • Do not bleach
  • Do not tumble dry
  • Iron at a maximum sole-plate temperature of 110°C
  • Mild professionnal dry cleaning in hydrocarbons
